content.raw:
I'm getting this `Box_TEST` failure:

~~~
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo6/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:1978: Failure
Failed
All tests in the same test case must use the same test fixture
class, so mixing TEST_F and TEST in the same test case is
illegal.  In test case BoxTest,
test EmptyConstructor is defined using TEST_F but
test Contains is defined using TEST.  You probably
want to change the TEST to TEST_F or move it to another test
case.
[  FAILED  ] BoxTest.Contains (0 ms)
~~~

probably be fixed by changing `TEST` to `TEST_F`
